column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Visited two days in a row for outstanding pastries and coffee. Be prepared for a long line. I'm typically okay with waiting for quality goods
column2: of which this certainly qualifies. However
column3: I don't think the line is because of so many people coming
column4: it is because the staff seems very unorganized. During both visits the staff taking orders was pleasant
column5: but they just did not seem at all efficient. Once I received my food and sat
column6: I watched as several potential customers left because of the line. That's a shame because they are losing business due to their inability to serve quick enough. Otherwise
